sentence.Network_en: Those who suffer from narcissism become self-absorbed or chronic show-offs.

sentence.Network_en: Those who suffer from narcissism become self-absorbed.
So had his mouth been set, rather full and controlled, a soft, self - absorbed pout.

entry.tran: 只顾自己的;自我专注的
entry.def: Someone who is self-absorbed thinks so much about things concerning themselves that they do not notice other people or the things around them.

means.word_mean: 1. absorbed in your own interests or thoughts etc
